title: Minutes of the General Assembly of the District of Funchal
original_title: Actas da Junta Geral do Distrito do Funchal
body: Under this title, several pamphlets in folio were published, relating to the years from 1837 to 1848, containing the minutes and deliberations of the General Assembly of this district, some of which are now very rare and contain interesting information about the administration of this district during that period.

Funchal: District where the deliberations of the General Assembly took place.

1837: Year of the beginning of the folio pamphlets relating to the minutes and deliberations of the General Assembly of the District of Funchal.
1848: Year of the end of the folio pamphlets relating to the minutes and deliberations of the General Assembly of the District of Funchal.
